summary: REQ-41 and REQ-42 are largely implemented: SplashScreen company name is split into words with a new display font class (font-display) and multi-color styling per word via new CSS classes. However, the diff also introduces broader theme/style changes and additional splash animations, and it is not clearly shown that reduced-motion mode disables animations while keeping the new font/color styling.

missing_requirements.requirement: In reduced-motion mode (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce), the new font and color styling still apply, and animations remain disabled as currently implemented.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds multiple splash animations (e.g., shimmer, entrance, fade-in) but the provided CSS does not show any @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) overrides to disable these animations. SplashScreen.tsx reads the preference, but only uses it to shorten the auto-complete duration, not to disable CSS animations.

missing_requirements.requirement: The splash screen continues to auto-transition, fade out, and allow skipping as before (preserve existing behavior).
missing_requirements.reason: SplashScreen.tsx changes the auto-complete timing based on reduced-motion (2000ms vs 4000ms). If the prior behavior was a fixed duration, this is a behavior change; the diff does not provide evidence that this matches the previous behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/token changes (OKLCH color system variables) beyond splash company name styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is limited to splash company name font/color styling and explicitly avoids changing the overall app theme outside that scope. index.css shows extensive changes to :root and .dark CSS variables (primary/accent/etc.) which affect the whole app.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded splash animations (text shimmer, glow effects, multiple keyframes) beyond the requested font and color styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-41/42 ask for font and color styling while preserving existing behavior; the diff adds new keyframes and applies new animations to company name and tagline.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested unrelated feature summaries/state updates mentioning admin panel and other functionality.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request is only about splash screen styling, but the modified summary/state files describe admin panel/navigation features unrelated to the request.
